rows.label: qst700603_msg0001
rows.name:
Thanks, guys! This should be enough to
get the machine up and running.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0002
rows.name: I'm this close to finishing it now...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0003
rows.name:
Let me go and attach the parts quickly,
and then I'll bring it straight over!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0004
rows.name:
Aha! So this is the fabled Bug Catcher
Turbotron BGX5000?!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0005
rows.name:
Would you look at that! Now this,
my friends, is a true work of art!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0006
rows.name:
So? How's this thing even supposed
to work?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0007
rows.name:
You better not be expecting us to lug
it around town or anything.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0008
rows.name: Huh? Of course not!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0009
rows.name:
It just creates a smokescreen that
the insects get drawn to.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0010
rows.name:
You just have to take it to a place
where there are a lot of bugs and let
it run. They'll come straight to you.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0011
rows.name: Bravo! Marco, lad, you are a legend!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0012
rows.name:
Thanks... But, um...is it OK if I ask you
guys for another favor?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0013
rows.name:
Fire away! We've come this far
together. We can hardly quit halfway
through, can we?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0014
rows.name: We're a team, remember?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah... Thanks!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0016
rows.name:
Go on then, what was it you
wanted to ask?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0017
rows.name: Right...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0018
rows.name: You know where the Haradd Hills are?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0019
rows.name: Do we?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0020
rows.name:
They're near Feltley Village, as
I recall. It's some way out from the
capital, beyond Dannagh Desert.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0021
rows.name:
That's round about the place where
we first met, isn't it?

rows.label: qst700603_msg0023
rows.name:
Thing is, I'm looking for a specific
type of bug, and I hear a lot of 'em
fly around the Haradd Hills.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0024
rows.name:
I was wondering if you could take my
machine there and collect some for me.

rows.label: qst700603_msg0025
rows.name: Absolutely! We'll do it!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0026
rows.name:
Don't you worry. The Bug Catcher
Turbotron BGX5000 will be safe
with us!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0027
rows.name: Yeah, all right. I really hope this works!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0028
rows.name: Oh yeah, one more thing...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0029
rows.name:
Um, this being my first ever
invention and all...

rows.label: qst700603_msg0030
rows.name:
I really want to know if it works the
way it's supposed to. So make sure
you tell me all about it!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0031
rows.name: Oh, you can be sure of it!

rows.label: qst700603_msg0032
rows.name:
In the name of Iira, I, Adel Olgo,
swear it will be done!
